last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shalini’s surreptitious activities at Rao’s house threaten to expose her. On the eve of the Skydome event, Bhanu comes up with an unexpected plan.

name: Leila
overview: In the forgotten margins of the segregated communities of a dystopian future, a woman searches for the daughter that she lost upon her arrest years ago.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Imprisoned in an Aryavarta purity camp after her family is attacked, Shalini plays by the rules, hoping to be released and reunited with her daughter.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While running from Bhanu and his men, Shalini meets an unlikely companion. As the two head to and reach Unnati, vivid memories replay in Shalini’s mind.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hoping to track down a reporter who could help her search for Leila, Shalini makes a risky deal. Secrets emerge about the family she now works for.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Determined to follow a new lead on Leila’s whereabouts, Shalini negotiates with Bhanu, who hesitates to trust her but knows she has something he wants.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After learning of a painful betrayal, Shalini agrees to be a mole at an Aryavarta politician’s home in exchange for the rebels' help in locating Leila.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Shalini’s surreptitious activities at Rao’s house threaten to expose her. On the eve of the Skydome event, Bhanu comes up with an unexpected plan.
